pullrequest.title: Move data logger to the toolbar

content.raw:
The whole thing seems to work for me. One comment about usability:

 * Gazebo maximized in the whole screen
 * I press the new of log, the recording window appears on top of Gazebo windows, nice
 * Don't ask me why, but I press again the checked log button to close the recording window
 * The button remains checked but the window was not closed and instead is now behind the gazebo window (standard behaviour of the window manager yes).

I leave to your consideration if we need to change it or it is just fine how it is.
